title: HP PCM+ AgentController Servlet Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of HP PCM Plus. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaws exist within the Agent servlet. This servlet is vulnerable to a command injection vulnerability when processing HEAD requests. A remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute remote code under the context of the SYSTEM user.
addtionnal_details: Hewlett-Packard has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://h20566.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03897409
timeline:
2013-02-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2013-09-11 - Coordinated public release of advisory
